document.title: Poetry and the Art of Meditation: Going behind the Symbols
document.abstract: Combining reader-response theory with spiritual teachings, this article explores how reading poetry may serve as an introduction to the art of meditation.
document.publication-title: The Journal of the Assembly for Expanded Perspectives on Learning
